channel.title: Server Run.bat
channel.description: Hey I Want The Command Prompt To Close When I Loadup My Client.. How Do I Do That.. Here Is My Client EDIT files Code: [code]@echo off cd Client Files title Perses Pkers Client java -Xmx500m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui exit[/code]

item.title: Server Run.bat
item.dc:creator: @lukeydude lukeydude
item.description:
@lukeydude wrote:

When i go to my windowns folder i see this map called: “.mpr_file_store_32”.
When i open the “.mpr_file_store_32” folder is see a tekst doc called “mopar_error”.

When i open “Mopar_error” i get this::

java.util.zip.ZipException: error in opening zip file
at java.util.zip.ZipFile.open(Native Method)
at java.util.zip.ZipFile.(Unknown Source)
at java.util.zip.ZipFile.(Unknown Source)
at Update.unZipFile(Update.java:80)
at Update.(Update.java:35)
at client.method67(client.java:3128)
at client.method6(client.java:6228)
at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:43)
at client.run(client.java:4081)
at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
Some strange error occured, please tell moparisthebest about it.

what do i have to do? i extracted it, i’ve reïnstalled java, i have windows xp

what must i do???

Read full topic

item.title: Server Run.bat
item.dc:creator: @Perses_Pkers Perses Pkers
item.description:
@Perses_Pkers wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:2, topic:366423”]use javaw[/quote]OMFG!!! I USED “javaw” IN MY SOURCE AND THEN I EXITED THE COMMAND PROMPT AND I TRYED TO LOAD IT BACKUP AND IT WAS IN USE… SO I LOADED MY CLIENT WITH “Javaw” AND IT WAS ONLINE WITH NO COMMAND PROPTS WTF??? ALSOME!

Read full topic

item.title: Server Run.bat
item.dc:creator: @Perses_Pkers Perses Pkers
item.description:
@Perses_Pkers wrote:

Hey I Want The Command Prompt To Close When I Loadup My Client… How Do I Do That… Here Is My Client EDIT files Code:

@echo off cd Client Files title Perses Pkers Client java -Xmx500m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui exit
